core:description.text: A slim-fitting red tank knit from ribbed cotton that skims the body without feeling restrictive. The fine rib-knit texture and breathable fibers keep air flowing during warmups or layered looks. Subtle stretch in the cotton blend makes it easy to move, with a scoop neckline that layers cleanly over the black longline sports bra. Pair it with the red matte Lycra bike shorts for a coordinated studio ensemble or slip it beneath a lightweight hoodie for cooldowns.
